item.description:
If you can't wait for the FMM "official" Star Trek meetup on 5/16, and you're free this Saturday night (5/9), why not head to our home base (Framingham 16 AMC) and go with Andy and company? They're going to catch the 7:00 show.

This is a NoOrg, so the tickets are full price. Andy has bought his already online, and you may want to do the same, as this movie may sell out by Saturday evening.

If you need to get in touch with Andy this Saturday evening, his cell number is: 978/201-3493.

Enjoy the show!

--Dana
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Andy Mc inside the theater doors
item.name: NoOrg -- Star Trek
